description: Faced with the rebound in coronavirus cases, on May 17, 2021, the authorities of five of the nine Bolivian departments decided to apply new restriction measures to reduce infections and contain the third wave of the pandemic. Santa Cruz, Cochabamba, La Paz, Chuquisaca and Pando determined the reduction of the movement of people, the opening of businesses only essential and the rigid confinement during the weekends. It will take effect from Monday 17 and will run until May 24, 2021, what the government wants is to avoid mass meetings and avoid the third wave of infections.

target_geog_level: One or more countries, but not all countries
target_who_gen: People who are not vaccinated against COVID-19
